snippet.title: Warhammer Online Production Video Podcast #5 - Types of RvR
snippet.description: In this month's Production Podcast, we take an in-depth look at The Realm War in Warhammer Online. You'll get a visual explanation for how Victory Points are gained (or lost) in RvR, and how they ultimately affect the Battlefronts and determine Zone Control. Take a few minutes to learn more about Battlefields, Skirmishes, and Scenarios and then set your strategic plan into motion to lead your Realm to Victory!
